document.full_text: a veteran new jersey police sergeant was killed after he fired a submachine gun at a team of police officers that had surrounded his home in a tense 10-hour standoff, authorities said on monday.
document.title: new jersey police officer killed after 10-hour standoff
lines_and_colors: a veteran new jersey police sergeant was killed after he fired a submachine gun at a team of police officers that had surrounded his home in a tense 10-hour standoff, authorities said on monday.
